ygData.msgSnippet: Dreadplague was still beating her massive wings in front of the Black Fortress. Once again, she roared. Dreadplague: Hydras! Hear me, for I deliver a message

Dreadplague was still beating her massive wings in front of the 
Black Fortress. Once again, she roared.

Dreadplague: Hydras! Hear me, for I deliver a message from Tyrael, 
my commander.
